column1: An honor for Kelly and I to cohost the @NCRTL Prayer Breakfast this morning. A very special thank you and congratulations to Barbara Holt who recently retired after 30 years as President of NC Right to Life. May we always value and protect the ever life - the born and unborn. https://t.co/aqbzx1soDb
Wishing many blessings for you and your family in 2020! We have much to accomplish in the year ahead. May God provide the path and may we have the courage to follow. https://t.co/wtZEuHhTMs

“Walker’s legislation could reverse troubling giving trends by empowering more donors to increase their donations to their church or charity of choice. [This] would allow donors to give to those in need without having to pay taxes on income they have donated.” – @Steve_Taylor_DC https://t.co/eA4Kpg5UH5
https://t.co/UMkC7GNzeT
If there ever was a time…  https://t.co/RylbzPdUkC

I hope Pat McCrory will join me in recognizing @DanForestNC is a strong conservative leader and the best candidate to win back the Governor’s mansion in 2020. North Carolina wants fresh candidates who have consistently won their elections. #ncpol
@jalenjjohnson Thank you Jalen!
@KenFarnaso @RepMarkWalker Thank you Ken.

I am humbled to have the support of my family friends and President Trump as we embark on the next step in our journey to serve North Carolina and put People Over Politics. #ncpol https://t.co/PILAUzSu3e

I introduced this resolution with @JasonSmithMO for this reason: if the impeachment sham moves to the Senate Senators will have to act as jurors for the trial. What serious court would allow a juror with such an obvious bias? https://t.co/09sz57mmbY

Locked arms w/ @chiproytx & @DrMarkGreen4TN in this effort.  A Mexican state that shares a 230mi border w/ US holds the same @StateDept travel warning as Iran & Syria because of violent cartels. We need to call them what they are: terrorist organizations.  https://t.co/uXFlil9GRZ

Did you see the jobs report from yesterday? I can assure you I will not be unemployed.  In fact the unemployment rate nationally is the lowest in my lifetime thanks to policies I have worked with @realDonaldTrump to pass. https://t.co/N3Q1lxDen2
Cramer: "These are the best numbers of our lives" on jobs https://t.co/RAmQN6KQt6

Proud to help lead this effort.   Unless it benefitted their fundraising the Senate Democrats running for President have ignored their day job and their constituents. Suddenly returning to DC to impeach @realDonaldTrump is unacceptable and mocks justice.  https://t.co/490hb7AwId

Though many on the Left and in the media try to denigrate the reputation of our devoted officers they work hard & sacrifice – even when we have a day off – to keep our families safe. We should be thankful every day for the men & women of law enforcement. https://t.co/5Ifrlz6NqG

Though in the political world silence and patience can be seen as a liability the Scriptures tell us to 'be joyful in hope patient in affliction faithful in prayer.’ While politicians in NC trade constituencies like baseball cards I will pray on God’s path forward. #ncpol https://t.co/CSSrhdTHef

Happy birthday @MaryVought - conservatives across the country are thankful for the work you and @SCF are doing. https://t.co/4pepxlnZdn

If this impeachment sham goes to a Senate trial think about calling the whistleblower and Adam Schiff to testify under oath. Where @realDonaldTrump can actually defend himself. I can promise you this it won’t be the same Schiff different day. https://t.co/vRqzKGtqKT

@WalkerBJohnnie @flyfrompti @RepMarkWalker Thanks John!
Some thoughts from @flyfrompti as I head to DC but here is the point: Keep your powder dry. #ncpol https://t.co/LOTZIybALv

Grateful to be with the @NCYoungGOP at the @GuilfordGOP HQ. The future of our great country truly rests on the shoulders of dedicated young people like these wonderful leaders. We can all feed off their energy. Onward! #ncfyr #LeadRight https://t.co/5J6riX0laG
Both acts hurt North Carolinians and damage the faith we have in our elections. I will continue to serve our constituents with all of my heart and strength wherever that path leads.

There is little assurance the districts passed today will hold up in court. Much like the abusive attempt to impeach @realDonaldTrump activist judges career bureaucrats and politicians are locking arms to override the will of the voters.

We took on Washington and Raleigh when I ran for Congress in 2014 and together we won. We did it with a new district in 2016. We will do it again in 2020. This was only possible by prioritizing people over politics – the exact opposite of what Raleigh is doing today. #ncpol

I love the people of NC and I will keep fighting for them – no matter what liberal attorneys judicial activists and politicians in Raleigh do in self-interest. My promise of people over politics is undeterred.  We'll continue to serve our constituents wherever the trail leads. https://t.co/D4conKoKKX
This quote reads like a Justin Bieber lyric. https://t.co/8xgPk35iJH
Exactly. #DoNothingDems https://t.co/G7n1yaM6VK

This is what Veterans Day is all about. Coming together – young and no longer young – to thank our veterans for answering the call to serve and doing so with selfless valor. Blessed to be part of this beautiful tribute to our heroes @well_spring_rc. #NC06 #VeteransDay https://t.co/NIea0wWHWr
Since 1775 Marines have defended our nation with distinction in “every clime and place.” Semper Fidelis! #HappyBirthdayMarines https://t.co/pGYj0bnQm2
“If you are pro-God and pro-America and pro-gun and pro-duck hunting…that's all I want.” 🇺🇸 https://t.co/BCO4HmUCzP
ELECTION DAY: If you have them please vote in municipal and local elections today. Many of these fine folks work long hours for a little or no pay just to better their communities. 🇺🇸 #ncpol
Strong writing from my friends Rep. Jim Sensenbrenner and @SteveChabot who were both involved in Clinton's 1998 impeachment:  https://t.co/HMqtQgiw0y

I miss my father-in-law who never met a stranger and took great pride in unashamedly asking them to vote in our first election. This picture including my nieces and sister-in-law reminds me of all the people who have faithfully supported us these past five years. So grateful. https://t.co/bQKJ1JVe2x

Sadly human trafficking is one of the fastest growing crimes within the US. While much more needs to be done to combat this activity I am proud that today’s congressional hearing can highlight the important work that is ongoing across North Carolina.  https://t.co/c0Hbjm8wZR

We are so proud of what we have accomplished in NC & across the US working with law enforcement & local agencies to combat the heinous crimes of human trafficking but we can do more. That's why I am leading a congressional hearing tomorrow in Greensboro. https://t.co/3BILGWWrbz

Disrupted? No.   Trying to listen to the secret impeachment plots in the basement of the Capitol? Yes. We are just trying to get Adam Schiff and the House Democrats to quit hiding and let the people of NC and the country see their sham impeachment process. https://t.co/zd0yxFzz2v
Every American deserves the due process protections guaranteed by the Constitution - including the President. https://t.co/tipo4Op3N5

A sweep for the @NCGOP tonight and a great sign of things to come for @DanForestNC and @realDonaldTrump next November. Congratulations to @jdanbishop on a hard fought victory. Come to DC with your sleeves rolled up. We’re getting to work for North Carolina! #NC09
Congratulations @DrGregMurphy1 on your victory in #NC03! Looking forward to working with you in Congress to help the people of North  Carolina thrive.
To all my friends in the Charlotte area and in #NC09 – please make time to go out and vote for @jdanbishop tomorrow! https://t.co/FlIuDrUGQc

20 candidates + 2 nights of promises and pontifications. Every candidate has one common theme: the government demands more control of your lives and needs even more of your money to make it happen. 6 hours of promoting dependence not hope is not the vision we need. #DemDebate
